oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Adding virtual measurements by signal injection
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Combes, Pascal
Jebai, Al Kassem
Malrait, François
Martin, Philippe
Rouchon, Pierre
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Optimization and Control
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We propose a method to "create" a new measurement output by exciting the system with a high-frequency oscillation. This new "virtual" measurement may be useful to facilitate the design of a suitable control law. The approach is especially interesting when the observability from the actual output degenerates at a steady-state regime of interest. The proposed method is based on second-order averaging and is illustrated by simulations on a simple third-order system.
